roleset.name: go-light
roleset.note: GOLIGHT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from golight.01-v)

roles.note: If anyone sees ANY more instances of this verb construction, please send them in. Particularly if they contain additional args that look like they should be #ed. (from golight.01-v)

example.name: The 1 instance
example.text: They-1 were attempting *PRO*-1 to go - light and were using our FMFM's to teach em techniques .
